disp-quote.p: If there's time, I might want to test… It's a problem of timing… I feel reluctant [when asked to go to a clinic]. Time becomes the problem. (sb19, Non Balinese, brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
I work, I could only go if it were on a holiday. (bk23, Balinese, brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
I don’t think I have time. I am a truck driver, rarely at home. (lu3, Balinese, brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
